testcase.name: HomePage Contact link
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Irish Life website homepage............................passed When user clicks on the "Contact" link in the top navigation................passed Then a new page loads which contains a contact form.........................passed

testcase.name: Find out more link
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Irish Life website homepage............................passed When user clicks on the "Find out more" link................................passed Then user should see a form which contains the text "I want to cover".......passed
